import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Recipe } from 'src/app/models/recipe.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-recipe-card', templateUrl: './recipe-card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./recipe-card.component.scss'] }) export class RecipeCardComponent { @Input() recipes: Recipe[]; }
